headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Valuation Check As Price Cuts, US$15b Brand Refresh And US$10b Buyback Reset Growth Plans
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) just rolled out a broad reset of its snacks and beverages portfolio, cutting prices on key brands, launching a US$15b brand refresh and authorizing a new US$10b share buyback program. See our latest analysis for PepsiCo. The reset comes after a strong run in the shares, with a 30 day share price return of 10.49% and a year to date share price return of 19.34%.
